Under the hood, the 4.2-liter inline-six has reportedly been upgraded with aftermarket camshafts, triple SU carburetors, an aluminum radiator, tubular headers, and an aftermarket exhaust system.

Additionally, the four-speed manual gearbox and rear differential are said to have been rebuilt and the suspension and braking systems have been overhauled as well.
